name: AI-Powered Smart Financial Insights Automation
description: Automated extraction and analysis of competitor earnings reports using LLMs, reducing analysis time from 8-10 hours to 1-2 hours while improving accuracy from 85% to 98%.
challenge: Manual gathering and analysis of competitor earnings reports was slow, error-prone, and reduced productivity, taking 8-10 hours per report with 15% error rate.
solution: Automated data retrieval through web crawling and manual uploads
Leveraged Large Language Models for insight extraction
Created UI-based interface for review and regeneration
Enabled multi-format export (Excel, PPT) for analysis

impact.accuracyImprovement: Error rate reduced from 15% to less than 2%
impact.productivityBoost: 3x increase - from 2-3 to 10+ reports per week

outcomes: 70% faster turnaround - same day instead of 3-5 days
